Metadata.title: Credat — The Developer SDK for EU Digital Identity
Metadata.description: Issue and verify eIDAS 2.0 verifiable credentials in 10 lines of TypeScript. SD-JWT VC & mDoc formats, OpenID4VC protocols, zero vendor lock-in. Open-source TypeScript SDK for eIDAS 2.0.
Metadata.ogDescription: Issue and verify eIDAS 2.0 verifiable credentials in 10 lines of TypeScript. SD-JWT VC & mDoc formats, OpenID4VC protocols.
Metadata.twitterDescription: Issue and verify eIDAS 2.0 verifiable credentials in 10 lines of TypeScript.

Hero.title: The Developer SDK for EU Digital Identity
Hero.description: Issue and verify eIDAS 2.0 verifiable credentials in 10 lines of TypeScript. SD-JWT VC & mDoc formats, OpenID4VC protocols, zero vendor lock-in.

eidas.title: eIDAS 2.0 Ready
eidas.description: Full compliance with the EU Digital Identity framework

typescript.title: TypeScript SDK
typescript.description: Type-safe APIs with complete IntelliSense support

Dx.title: Your Credential Powerhouse
Dx.description: From credential schema design to issuance, verification, and selective disclosure — everything you need in a single, composable SDK.

nationalId.title: National ID Wallet
nationalId.description: Issue government-backed digital identity credentials compliant with the EU Digital Identity Wallet architecture. Support selective disclosure so citizens share only what's needed.

diploma.title: Digital Diploma
diploma.description: Universities and training providers can issue tamper-proof educational credentials. Employers verify qualifications instantly without contacting the institution.

banking.title: Banking KYC
banking.description: Streamline customer onboarding with reusable identity credentials. Reduce KYC costs while maintaining regulatory compliance across jurisdictions.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Credentials
healthcare.description: Issue and verify professional medical licenses, vaccination records, and patient consent credentials with privacy-preserving selective disclosure.

travel.title: Travel Documents
travel.description: Enable seamless border crossing with mobile driving licenses and travel credentials based on ISO 18013-5 and mDoc formats.

credentialFormats.title: Credential Formats
credentialFormats.description: First-class support for both EU-mandated credential formats, ready for the EUDIW ecosystem.

openid4vci.name: OpenID4VCI
openid4vci.description: Issue credentials using the OpenID for Verifiable Credential Issuance protocol.

openid4vp.name: OpenID4VP
openid4vp.description: Request and verify credential presentations with OpenID for Verifiable Presentations.

didcomm.name: DIDComm v2
didcomm.description: Secure, peer-to-peer messaging for credential exchange between agents.

sophie.quote: Credat made our eIDAS 2.0 integration effortless. We went from zero to issuing credentials in a single sprint.
sophie.name: Sophie L.

marcus.quote: The SD-JWT VC implementation is rock-solid. Selective disclosure just works out of the box with clean APIs.
marcus.name: Marcus W.

elena.quote: Finally an SDK that takes both credential formats seriously. The mDoc support saved us months of development.
elena.name: Elena R.

james.quote: TypeScript-first with incredible DX. The type safety across credential schemas caught bugs we would have shipped.
james.name: James C.

anna.quote: We evaluated three SSI SDKs. Credat was the only one that handled OpenID4VC protocols correctly and at scale.
anna.name: Anna K.

pierre.quote: Open source, spec-compliant, and maintained by people who understand the European identity landscape. Highly recommended.
pierre.name: Pierre D.

eidas.label: Full Compliance
eidas.description: Built from the ground up for the EU Digital Identity framework. Every API maps to a regulation requirement.

bundle.label: Gzipped Bundle
bundle.description: Tree-shakeable ESM architecture. Import only what you need — credential issuance, verification, or both.

formats.label: SD-JWT VC & mDoc
formats.description: First-class support for both EU-mandated credential formats. Switch between them with a single config change.

import.title: Import the SDK
import.description: A single import gives you everything — issuance, verification, and credential management.

create.title: Create a Client
create.description: Configure your credential format and issuer identity. Supports SD-JWT VC and mDoc out of the box.

issue.title: Issue a Credential
issue.description: Define the credential type and claims. The SDK handles schema validation, signing, and encoding.

verify.title: Verify Instantly
verify.description: One-line verification with full status checking, signature validation, and revocation support.

Cta.title: Build the Future of Digital Identity
Cta.description: Credat is open source and built for the community. Start issuing eIDAS 2.0 credentials in minutes — or contribute to shape the standard.

Footer.brand: The open-source TypeScript SDK for eIDAS 2.0 verifiable credentials. Issue, verify, and manage digital identity — in 10 lines of code.

HeroFlow.ariaLabel: Verifiable Credentials flow: Issuer issues credential to Holder, who presents it to Verifier
